definitions.text: a politically organized body of people under a single government
examples: the state has elected a new president
students who had come to the nation's capitol

definitions.text: the people who live in a nation or country
examples: a statement that sums up the nation's mood
the news was announced to the nation

definitions.text: United States prohibitionist who raided saloons and destroyed bottles of liquor with a hatchet (1846-1911)
a federation of tribes (especially Native American tribes)
